comments:
3.0RC1
I was playing around with the new Manifest editor and turned off the option in 
the Build tab to Include the selected library in the binary build. Then I 
switched over to the build.properties tab to see what effect that had and I 
got an error dialog that just said Overlapping text edits. Then when I tried 
to save the file I got an assertion failure and a save failure error. Here's 
the log:
